definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: I get finished with all my errands before it starts to rain.
sentences.chinese: 我真的希望能在下雨前将这些差事干完。

sentences.english: Do not misconstrue it as an effort to exert force or pressure.
sentences.chinese: 不要把它误解为需要卯尽全力或施加压力的苦差事。

sentences.english: Norman and I were deputed for the unpleasant task.
sentences.chinese: 我和诺曼被委派去干这件苦差事。

sentences.english: Remembering so a lot new phrases is really exert work.
sentences.chinese: 记住这么多新英语字词真是件苦差事。

sentences.english: Work without love is a slavery.
sentences.chinese: 没有爱的工作是一件苦差事。

sentences.english: That's a bummer. Does he sit still and let you brush them?
sentences.chinese: 感觉是件苦差事。你家的狗会乖乖不动让你刷牙吗？

sentences.english: Tomorrow, I can drive because I'm running errands.
sentences.chinese: 明天，驾驶汽车，因为我有短期差事在身。

sentences.english: He wormed out of giving a lecture that afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 那天下午他把做讲座的差事推卸掉了。

sentences.english: I managed to talk my way out of having to give a speech.
sentences.chinese: 我好说歹说总算逃脱了发言差事。

sentences.english: Young men revel in doing dangerous tasks.
sentences.chinese: 年轻小伙子特别喜欢干有危险性的苦差事。

sentences.english: I’ve heard a whisper that old Bill’s going to lose his job next month.
sentences.chinese: 谣传说老比尔下个月要丢差事了。

sentences.english: I have done the errands quickly.
sentences.chinese: 我很快干完了这些差事。

sentences.english: “Without concrete and desirable goals, a budget is just drudgery, ” Rich said.
sentences.chinese: 没有稳固和满意的目标，预算就会成为一件苦差事。

sentences.english: The new status of the rejected errand is now reflected in the list.
sentences.chinese: 差事的被拒绝新状态现在反映到了列表中。

definition: to send/to assign/to appoint/servants of an official/official messenger
official post/billet/commission/CL:件[jian4]/see also 差事[chai1 shi5]
hard task/difficult mission/arduous and unrewarding undertaking/drudgery/grind/chore
to order (sb) around/to send on an errand/to order away
